resources.string: The app will not work without the permission, please activate it in Settings->Apps->PRECIOUS->Permissions
Precious is all about helping you to get more of what you want out of life.
Whether you want to have more fun, stay healthy, challenge yourself, or something completely different, Precious can help you get there.
Unable to calculate calories without knowing you weight, you have to register/login first
"Gender" field is empty, please scroll down
One or more parameters are empty
One or more parameters are incorrect. Weight and heght must be in kg and cm and the minimum age to register is 15.
Please enter your 3-digit group ID code. If you are not taking part of the Campden BRI trials and do not have a code, please enter 123.
Please check your group ID code and try again.

1. You shall not sublicense, distribute, lease, loan or otherwise convey the application or any portion thereof to anyone. You shall not modify the application, incorporate the application in whole or part in any other product or create derivative works.. You shall not reverse assemble, translate the app into another language, decompile or disassemble or otherwise reverse engineer any portion of the application. The app itself, and all the trade marks, copyright, database rights and other intellectual property rights related to it, still belong to the PRECIOUS Project consortium.
2. The application is not designed nor intended for use in any situation in which the failure of the application could lead to death or injury.

3. You acknowledge and agree that no medical advice is provided through the application and that you are using the application at your own risk. The application is intended for informational and educational use only and cannot be used to schedule or plan procedures, medication or supplements usage, or anything where accuracy is required. Please consult your health care provider for any health concerns.
4. In no event shall the PRECIOUS consortium be liable to you for any special, consequential, punitive, exemplary, incidental or indirect damages of any kind.

5. The PRECIOUS application uses the following permissions: a. Location: it is needed for linking the physical activity data with the geographical location of the user. It is also used to measure the distance when GPS is enabled and the user is walking, running or riding a bike. b. Access to the external memory of the smart phone: it is needed for storing the information and send it to the server afterwards. c. Camera: it is used for the digital image recognition of the food and the face size estimation. d. Device ID: it is used to create the user ID which will allow the user to authenticate himself to the server.
6. This agreement supersedes all previous agreements. If the agreement is updated, you will be made aware.
Problem with PRECIOUS Android app, version
To help you most effectively, Precious needs to know what you really want. So, let\'s get started!
Before swiping forward, think about things that really increase your well-being and happiness.
Would any of these fit? \n Choose up to 4 options that you would want from the list below.
Please choose one behaviour, even if it isn\'t a perfect fit for you at the moment.
have fun being active with other people
prevent an illness that runs in my family
Of those that you selected, which one is the MOST important for you right now?
So, you want to %1$s. Great! There are many different ways to do that. Which of these would best help you to %1$s, so that Precious can guide you on your way.
Please choose one option from the previous screen.
Based on your responses it seems that you think a change in your %1$s can help you to %2$s. That\'s good to know! Precious will now help you on the path to getting more of what you want.
On a scale of 1-10, how important is physical activity to you?
Please choose a number in the previous screen
Why did you choose %1$d and not %2$d? \nIf you wish, think about your reasons for a second before moving forward."
Seems that physical activity is not important to you. Which of these would make becoming more physically active be important to you?"
Physical activity could most help me to ...
Please set your outcome goal first in the *What do I want?* application.
Thanks! In other words, physical activity has importance to you because it helps you to %1$s. Precious will keep this reason in mind to support you on the way.
Did you forget to set your steps goal?
It will help you to better track your physical activity lifestyle!
You are not allowed to set the goal for the current day after 12:00 o\'clock
Modification of automatic records is not allowed
Are you sure you want to delete the activity?
Did you forget to log your breakfast?
Did you forget to log your lunch?
Did you forget to log your dinner?
Application is still waiting to collect data
Google Play services: unable to resolve connection error.
Received an unknown activity request code %1$d in onActivityResult.
You have to wear the FirstBeat device first.
There is a connection problem with the PRECIOUS server, please check you Internet connection or try again later.
You are not taking any challenge right now! Please select one or more challenges by clicking on the add button.
Read the description of each challenge by selecting its title. To add a challenge, use the plus button and it will be added to your current diet challenges.
Users from Campden BRI are not allowed to add more challenges

We all know that it is important to eat fruits and vegetables, but few of us actually eat enough of them! Take this challenge to see if you can meet the recommendations of the World Health Organisation.
Many popular snacks are high in fat, sugar, salt and low in fibre, and we often eat more of these than we realise. Take this challenge if you\'d like to cut unhealthy snacks out of your diet.

Sugary drinks can be refreshing, but many contain much more sugar than we realise. Consuming too many of them can increase risks of tooth decay and diabetes. Take this challenge if you\'d like to cut down on your intake of sugary drinks.

Fried foods are high in fat, and over-consuming them can lead to weight gain and increased risks of cardiovascular disease and type 2 diabetes. Take this challenge if you would like to cut back on the number of fried portions you eat.

Alcohol can have many negative effects on your health and sleep quality, and over-consumption can increase your risk of cardiovascular disease and type 2 diabetes. Take this challenge if you wish to cut back on your alcohol intake.

Water is essential for life, and ensuring that we drink enough of it keeps us hydrated and healthy. Take this challenge if you would like to increase your water intake and meet the European recommendations.
Regardless of how active you are now, how do you feel about becoming more physically active?
I definitely don\'t want to be more active
I have mixed feelings about becoming more active
I might want to be more active
I definitely want to be more active
"Seems like getting more active is not for you right now. Is this because you are already active and want to keep that up? Or is it because other things are more important for you at the moment? "
"OK. It seems you have some doubts about whether you would like to become more active. That's perfectly natural. Let's see. . . How active are you in a typical day?"
"Excellent! It seems like you're ready to get started and know exactly what you want. Becoming more active will help you to %1$s, and PRECIOUS will suggest a number of tools to help you on your way."
"I'd like to maintain my current activity."
"I am not sure how active I am"
"I am active for more than 30 minutes every day "
"So, you want to keep as active as you are now - Great! PRECIOUS has several tools to help maintain your current level of activity. Suggested tools will appear for you on the home screen."

"OK, so you are not interested in increasing your physical activity right now. That's fine! If you want to, you can choose other activities and come back to reconsider physical activity later. You will find PRECIOUS' recommendations for you on the home screen."

"Although you don't consider yourself very active at the moment, you have thought about whether getting more active is right for you. Good news: PRECIOUS is built for people just like you, and has tools to help you make decisions. Check out the suggested tools on the home screen."
"Many people are unsure of how active they are. Good news: PRECIOUS can help you find out, and also help you to %1$s. Check the suggested apps on the home screen."
"It seems that you are already pretty active and you might want to do even more, great!! Check the suggested tools on the home screen to help keep you going."
"Great, it seems that you are already close to the recommended amount of activity per day! And you still want to be more active - perfect! PRECIOUS will help you to be more active and to %1$s"

There is evidence that thinking about success - either by remembering past successes or imagining a successful future - can increase motivation and self-confidence. This time-machine app will take you on a journey to the past and future to help you on your way.
Can you remember a time when you were active and really enjoyed it?
Swipe forward to travel back to the year %1$s!

"Think about that enjoyable active moment back in %1$s. . . How did it feel physically? How was the environment? How did you feel afterwards? What was special about it? Close your eyes for a moment and revisit that feeling. . ."

"Many people have difficulties recalling times when they enjoyed being active. Instead, let's start the time machine and visit the future. . . Imagine yourself being active and enjoying it. . . Where are you? How does it feel physically? How is your mood? How is your life different? Close your eyes for a moment and visualize yourself enjoying being active."

"Now that you've looked backwards, let's start the time machine and visit the future. . . Imagine yourself being active and enjoying it. . . Where are you? How does it feel physically? How is your mood? How is your life different? Close your eyes for a moment and visualize yourself enjoying being active."
Well done time-traveller! Now returning to the present. . .

"Earlier, you said that being physically active would help you to %1$s.
Well, there are many different ways to be active, and some which you would enjoy more than others. Swipe forward to ensure you will get recommendations you like."
Choose your favourite activities (and those which you might want to try later) from the list below.
Thanks for choosing your favourite physical activities. If you feel like, why not go and try some already today!
On a scale of 1-10, how confident are you that you could be physically active on a regular basis?
Seems that you are not sure that you could be active now. That\'s OK. Luckily Precious has a few tools that might help you become more confident.
You already have some confidence that you could be active now. Good! If you are interested, Precious has a number of tools to help you boost your confidence even further.
Seems that you are already quite confident that you can be active - Excellent! If you are interested, Precious has a number of tools to help you boost your confidence even further.
You\'re already very confident you could be active - That\'s fantastic! If you are interested, Precious can offer you some tools to help keep your confidence sky high and turn it into behaviour.
Which of these could help you become more confident about being active, and move from a %1$d to say a %2$d? (You can choose more than one)

Which of these could help you remain this c
onfident about being active? (You can choose more than one)
Remembering times I enjoyed being active
Keeping track of my day-to-day activity

Recalling moments you enjoyed physical activity can help you find confidence and motivation that you need in order to be active again. The Time Machine can help you revisit those positive experiences.

Research shows that creating detailed activity plans can support activity. Scheduling and preparing for activity in advance can help you get to where you want to be, and for that, the Mountain climber app has a built-in planning tool.

Visualising oneself enjoying physical activity has been shown to increase motivation for being active. Precious\' time machine app can help you peek in the future and to visualise positive benefits that physical activity could offer you.

Setting and striving toward realistic activity goals can help people build confidence in their abilities to be active. The Mountain climber app can help you set activity goals that are challenging, yet attainable and in line with what you already do.

A large amount of scientific evidence indicates that monitoring day to day activity can help people stay on track and achieve your goals. Use Precious\' Mountain climber app to see how active you are.

Seems that you didn\'t find any tools that might increase your confidence for activity. If you want more information about the tools PRECIOUS can offer, swipe back and select a choice to see some information about it. You can also revisit this app later if you wish.
Seems like you found a tool that might help you increase your confidence for activity. Great! Precious will suggest this tool for you on the home screen.
Seems that you found some tools that might help you increase your confidence for activity. Great! Precious will suggest these tools for you on the home screen.
